jpaint

Class PaintController

  • Object
    • PaintController

  • public class PaintController
extends Object
    The class with the FXML functionality methods
    Version:
    1.0.3 14 Apr 2017
    Author:
    Carter Brainerd

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PaintController() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void displayAbout()
      Displays the "about" message using helpers.alertUser(String, String, String, Alert.AlertType)
      void initialize()
      Called automatically by the FXMLLoader.
      void onClear()
      Clears the canvas
      void onExit()
      Exits out of the program
      void onOpen()
      Opens a file and displays it on the Canvas
      void onPrint()
      Has the user select a printer, then starts a PrinterJob to print the canvas
      void onSave()
      Saves a png snapshot of the image (as of 1.0.0, it's paint.png)
      void onSaveAs()
      Opens a FileChooser window and saves the image as the inputted name.png
      void openSource()
      Opens a GitHub link to the source code of JPaint
      void setBrushBrush()
      Setter for brush type (Changes it to circle)
      void setBrushPencil()
      Setter for brush type (Changes it to square)

      • Methods inherited from class Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        public PaintController()

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        Called automatically by the FXMLLoader. Allows for the actual painting to happen on the Canvas
        Since:
        1.0.0
        Updated in version
        1.0.2

      • onSave

        public void onSave()
        Saves a png snapshot of the image (as of 1.0.0, it's paint.png)
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • onSaveAs

        public void onSaveAs()
        Opens a FileChooser window and saves the image as the inputted name.png
        Since:
        1.0.1
        See Also:
        FileChooser, ImageIO

      • onOpen

        public void onOpen()
        Opens a file and displays it on the Canvas
        Since:
        1.0.1
        Updated in version
        1.0.2

      • onPrint

        public void onPrint()
        Has the user select a printer, then starts a PrinterJob to print the canvas
        See Also:
        PrinterJob

      • onExit

        public void onExit()
        Exits out of the program
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • displayAbout

        public void displayAbout()
        Displays the "about" message using helpers.alertUser(String, String, String, Alert.AlertType)
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • openSource

        public void openSource()
                throws AlertException,
                       IOException
        Opens a GitHub link to the source code of JPaint
        Throws:
        AlertException - If the error alert can't show
        IOException - If the GitHub URL wasn't reachable
        Since:
        1.0.3

      • setBrushBrush

        public void setBrushBrush()
        Setter for brush type (Changes it to circle)
        Since:
        1.0.2

      • setBrushPencil

        public void setBrushPencil()
        Setter for brush type (Changes it to square)
        Since:
        1.0.2

        public void onClear()
        Clears the canvas
        Since:
